          <title>
            <string language="es">Partes de un artículo de enciclopedia</string>
            <string language="en">Parts of an encyclopaedia article</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Teile eines Enzyklopädieartikels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Parties d'un article d'encyclopédie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Partes de um artigo do encyclopaedia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parti di un articolo dell'enciclopedia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέρη ενός άρθρου εγκυκλοπαιδειών</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Relación de cada parte del artículo de enciclopedia 'Civilización musulmana en la Península Ibérica' con su respectivo nombre.</string>
            <string language="en">Matching each part of the encyclopaedia article on the muslim civilisation in the Iberian Peninsula</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Lengua Castellana y Literatura</string>
            <string language="en">Castilian and Literature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Enciclopedia</string>
            <string language="en">Encyclopaedia</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusammenbringen jedes Teils des 
Enzyklopädieartikels auf der moslemischen Zivilisation in der 
Iberischen Halbinsel</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Apparier chaque partie de l'article 
d'encyclopédie sur la civilisation musulmane dans la péninsule 
ibérienne</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Combinando cada parte do artigo do encyclopaedia 
na civilização muçulmana na península iberian</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Abbinare ogni parte dell'articolo 
dell'enciclopedia sulla civilizzazione musulmana nella penisola 
iberica</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταίριασμα κάθε μέρους του άρθρου εγκυκλοπαιδειών 
σχετικά με το μουσουλμανικό πολιτισμό στην ιβηρική χερσόνησο</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Castilian und Literatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Enzyklopädie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Castillan et littérature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Encyclopédie</string>
